title: Spring Sunset Haiku
content:
On the road home from groceries, our poet encountered a sunrise...

Occhio per occhio rende tutto il mondo cieco

No photos :( ~

camera hibernates

deep in spring.

Tramonto in marzo... il tempo sicuramente vola

Spring sunset ~

its sexiness is always

ending.

Suonare sullo sfondo

Mountains whose orange

is a bit grayer

in the back.

E infine...

終不為君通

Ciel rose perlé ~

au-dessus de

mots en toc sur Dieu.
